20110114020604.000|20110114020606.000|CC1|NO MATTER HOW RATIONAL THE      
20110114020606.000|20110114020607.000|CC1|RESTRICTION.

20110114020608.000|20110114020609.000|CC1|WISDOM.                         
20110114020609.000|20110114020611.000|CC1|THE FACT IT'S COMMON DOESN'T

20110114020612.000|20110114020613.000|CC1|THAT'S A RADICAL ASSERTION.

20110114020615.000|20110114020617.000|CC1|ANYTHING ABOUT GUNS, THAT HAS   
20110114020617.000|20110114020618.000|CC1|NEVER BEEN TRUE OF GUN POLITICS 
20110114020618.000|20110114020620.000|CC1|IN MODERN TIMES.

20110114020622.000|20110114020624.000|CC1|THE TABLE, THAT'S A REJECTION OF
20110114020624.000|20110114020626.000|CC1|THE CENTRIST CONSENSUS WE HAVE  
20110114020626.000|20110114020627.000|CC1|HAD FOR GENERATIONS.

20110114020633.000|20110114020634.000|CC1|ABSOLUTISTS.

20110114020636.000|20110114020639.000|CC1|LOT OF DOMESTIC ENEMIES OF THE  
20110114020639.000|20110114020639.000|CC1|CONSTITUTION, AND THEY'RE RIGHT 
20110114020639.000|20110114020640.000|CC1|DOWN THE MALL IN THE CONGRESS OF
20110114020640.000|20110114020648.000|CC1|THE UNITED STATES.              
20110114020648.000|20110114020649.000|CC1|RIGHT DOWN INDEPENDENCE AVENUE  
20110114020649.000|20110114020651.000|CC1|IN THE WHITE HOUSE OF THE UNITED
20110114020651.000|20110114020654.000|CC1|STATES -- THAT BELONGS TO US.   
20110114020654.000|20110114020656.000|CC1|IT'S NOT ABOUT MY ABILITY TO    
20110114020656.000|20110114020659.000|CC1|HUNT, WHICH I LOVE TO DO.       
20110114020659.000|20110114020701.000|CC1|IT'S NOT ABOUT THE ABILITY FOR  
20110114020701.000|20110114020703.000|CC1|ME TO PROTECT MY PEOPLE AND     
20110114020703.000|20110114020704.000|CC1|PROPERTY AGAINST CRIMINALS,     
20110114020704.000|20110114020707.000|CC1|WHICH WE HAVE THE RIGHT TO DO.  
20110114020707.000|20110114020709.000|CC1|BUT IT'S ABOUT -- IT'S ALL ABOUT
20110114020709.000|20110114020712.000|CC1|US PROTECTING OURSELVES FROM A  
20110114020712.000|20110114020713.000|CC1|TYRANNICAL GOVERNMENT OF THE    
20110114020713.000|20110114020715.000|CC1|UNITED STATES.                  
20110114020715.000|20110114020717.000|CC1|>> SECOND AMENDMENT, NOT ABOUT  
20110114020717.000|20110114020718.000|CC1|HUNTING OR SELF-DEFENSE.        
20110114020718.000|20110114020720.000|CC1|IT'S ABOUT CITIZENS HAVING THE

20110114020728.000|20110114020729.000|CC1|TYRANNICAL GOVERNMENT OF THE    
20110114020729.000|20110114020730.000|CC1|UNITED STATES.                  
20110114020730.000|20110114021140.000|SEG|Type=Story
20110114020730.000|20110114020731.000|CC1|>>> THE WASHINGTON POST WROTE   
20110114020731.000|20110114020733.000|CC1|ABOUT THIS.                     
20110114020733.000|20110114020734.000|CC1|FINDING CONGRESSMAN IRANIAN PAUL
20110114020734.000|20110114020736.000|CC1|MAKING THE SAME ARGUMENT IN     
20110114020736.000|20110114020736.000|CC1|PRINT FIVE YEARS AGO.           
20110114020736.000|20110114020737.000|CC1|THE SECOND AMENDMENT IS NOT     
20110114020737.000|20110114020739.000|CC1|ABOUT HUNTING DEER OR KEEPING A 
20110114020739.000|20110114020740.000|CC1|PISTOL IN YOUR NIGHT STAND.     
20110114020740.000|20110114020748.000|CC1|IT'S NOT ABOUT PROTECTING       
20110114020748.000|20110114020752.000|CC1|ONESELF AGAINST ENEMIES.        
20110114020752.000|20110114020755.000|CC1|IT'S ABOUT OVERTHROWING A       
20110114020755.000|20110114020757.000|CC1|TYRANNICAL GOVERNMENT.          
20110114020757.000|20110114020800.000|CC1|THE ARGUMENT IS THAT THE SECOND 
20110114020800.000|20110114020801.000|CC1|AMENDMENT EXISTS SO THE CITIZENS
20110114020801.000|20110114020803.000|CC1|CAN OVERTHROW THE GOVERNMENT.   
20110114020803.000|20110114020804.000|CC1|THAT IS A VIEW, A RADICAL VIEW  
20110114020804.000|20110114020805.000|CC1|OF GUN POLICY.                  
20110114020805.000|20110114020807.000|CC1|>> WE'VE HAD HAD RECORD GUN     
20110114020807.000|20110114020807.000|CC1|SALES.                          
20110114020807.000|20110114020809.000|CC1|WHEN AMERICANS ARE ASKED, WHY   
20110114020809.000|20110114020810.000|CC1|ARE YOU BUYING GUNS?            
20110114020810.000|20110114020813.000|CC1|THEY'RE BUYING IT FOR CIVIL     
20110114020813.000|20110114020816.000|CC1|UNREST AND TO IT FIGHT BACK

20110114022624.000|20110114022625.000|CC1|EVIDENT IN THE DATA.

20110114022627.000|20110114022629.000|CC1|EQUAL LESS CRIME.               
20110114022629.000|20110114022630.000|CC1|MORE GUNS DO NOT EQUAL LESS     
20110114022630.000|20110114022630.000|CC1|CRIME.

20110114024459.000|20110114024459.000|CC1|      can help control your     
20110114024459.000|20110114024501.000|CC1|         bladder muscle,        
20110114024501.000|20110114024501.000|CC1|        and is proven to        
20110114024501.000|20110114024503.000|CC1|    treat overactive bladder    
20110114024503.000|20110114024503.000|CC1| with symptoms of frequent urges
20110114024503.000|20110114024507.000|CC1|    and leaks, day and night.   
20110114024507.000|20110114024507.000|CC1|       If you have certain      
20110114024507.000|20110114024509.000|CC1|  stomach or glaucoma problems, 
20110114024509.000|20110114024509.000|CC1|       or trouble emptying      
20110114024509.000|20110114024510.000|CC1|          your bladder,         
20110114024510.000|20110114024512.000|CC1|      do not take VESIcare.     
20110114024512.000|20110114024512.000|CC1|       VESIcare may cause       
20110114024512.000|20110114024513.000|CC1|       allergic reactions       
20110114024513.000|20110114024515.000|CC1|      that may be serious.      
20110114024515.000|20110114024515.000|CC1|   If you experience swelling   
20110114024515.000|20110114024517.000|CC1|       of the face, lips,       
20110114024517.000|20110114024517.000|CC1|  throat or tongue, stop taking 
20110114024517.000|20110114024520.000|CC1|VESIcare and get emergency help.
20110114024520.000|20110114024521.000|CC1|   Tell your doctor right away

20110114024523.000|20110114024523.000|CC1|      or become constipated

20110114025642.000|20110114025644.000|CC1|POINTS ON A COME PASS.          
20110114025644.000|20110114025646.000|CC1|A COME PASS DEPENDS ON MAGNETIC 
20110114025646.000|20110114025647.000|CC1|FIELDS TO WORK.                 
20110114025647.000|20110114025649.000|CC1|THAT'S HOW A COME PASS NEEDLE   
20110114025649.000|20110114025651.000|CC1|KNOWS WHERE TO POINT.           
20110114025651.000|20110114025654.000|CC1|THAT'S HOW A COMPASS NEEDLE

20110114025655.000|20110114025657.000|CC1|IT'S POINTING TOWARD MAGNETIC   
20110114025657.000|20110114025658.000|CC1|NORTH.                          
20110114025658.000|20110114025659.000|CC1|THE PROBLEM WITH THE RUNWAY IS  
20110114025659.000|20110114025702.000|CC1|THAT MAGNETIC NORTH MOVES.
